H0.text: Safety precaution is the example of wearing personal protective equipment such as goggles and gloves during an experiment.

H1.text: Pollution precaution is wearing personal protective equipment such as goggles and gloves during an experiment.

H2.text: Lab organization is exemplified by wearing personal protective equipment such as goggles and gloves during an experiment.

H3.text: Office politics is an example of wearing personal protective equipment such as goggles and gloves during an experiment.

A4.text: gloves are an essential item in providing skin protection

A5.text: Goggles provide protection from external debris and should provide side protection via a wrap-around design or side shields
